replies.body: I'm loving all the new Ekko pieces :D  I wonder if there might be a way to get his jaw to look a bit more set and determined?  At the moment, he looks like he's pondering something deeply, rather than the determined expression I associate with him.  Even a smirk would work really well (the VO certainly has a lot of lines that would be accompanied by a smirk :)

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=I6BKcnq2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-14T18:21:21.051+0000)
>
> I'm loving all the new Ekko pieces :D  I wonder if there might be a way to get his jaw to look a bit more set and determined?  At the moment, he looks like he's pondering something deeply, rather than the determined expression I associate with him.  Even a smirk would work really well (the VO certainly has a lot of lines that would be accompanied by a smirk :)

Thank you for your advice, I wil try >_<
